name: Oceania
declaringWar: You have committed the greatest of crimes: a thought crime. Prepare to be erased from history.
attacked: Oceania is eternal. All memory of your resistance will be... erased.
defeated: Temporary setbacks are irrelevant, the Party will rise again.
hateHello: We know what you are. History will not remember your defiance.
denounced: We have always been enemies. We were never allies with you.
tradeRequest: The Party grants you this gift for your loyalty.
declaringFriendship: We have always been allies. We were never enemies with you.
uniques: Comment [Halves some of the effects of unhappiness when at war]
[-1] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
[+37]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-1] Happiness> <when at war> <hidden from users>
[+25]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness> <when at war> <hidden from users>
[+16]% Strength <for [All] units> <when below [-10] Happiness> <when at war> <hidden from users>
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>

name: Eastasia
declaringWar: It has become apparent you refuse to accept the truth, now we must force you to realize it.
attacked: You still hold on to the belief that your past sins are forgiven?
We have always been at war, I just gave you the mercy of a first strike.
defeated: The Obliteration of Self isn't just a thought, it's a truth. While you crumble from within, Eastasia will endure...
introduction: You will soon come to learn the Four Truths...
neutralHello: In this life, you will learn the truth.
hateHello: You continue to suffer, not because you're special, but because you refuse to accept forgiveness...
denounced: There is still hope for you, repent now and you may be forgiven.
tradeRequest: This may help in your journey to seek the redemption for your past sins.
declaringFriendship: You are close to the truth, but you are not there yet. Let us help you in achieving enlightment.
uniques: [+15]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when not at war>

name: Eurasia
declaringWar: You have become an enemy of the people! Fear not, your people will soon be free.
attacked: Your so called "resistance" is meaningless, prepare for the full might of Eurasia!
defeated: It is without doubt, the State will rise again, and you will fall, be forgotten, you... are nothing.
introduction: Welcome to glorious Eurasia! You will need to prove yourself an ally of Eurasia to share some of this glory.
denounced: The people of Eurasia are disappointed in you.
tradeRequest: For your people, as they need help from imperialists like you.
declaringFriendship: Eurasia welcomes a champion of the people like you. I would do you well to accept this, comrade.
uniques: [+25]% of excess happiness converted to [Production] <in [Capital] cities>

name: The Brotherhood
attacked: You will see it soon, freedom always prevails!
defeated: You won't succeed, everything falls apart eventually...
introduction: Have we been found? No, not yet. Be wary, they may see you here.
hateHello: You are a dead man walking.
denounced: You didn't have to do this, you could have help me instead...
tradeRequest: This may help in the revolution, please accept.
declaringFriendship: Among the many regimes I've seen, you stand out as one who respect the fundemental rights of humanity. What do you say about getting better acquainted?
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to [Culture]
[+10]% Strength <for [{Military} {Land}] units> <in [Friendly Land] tiles> <when above [10] Happiness>
